reviews.comment: Nice RGB LED Controller at affordable price, Just go for it...
Excellent and Quality product, Worth Buying

I was skeptical to order these and branded ones were very expensive or of not so good quality basically local items.But very happy that i bought, very easy installation and good quality of strip and controller. I have ordered 5 more for my entire home
It's a fantastic product. Got delivered on time, nicely packed. it is very decent and value for money product.
I got a damaged product..do not buy guys..was expecting something really nice
